name: Toyota Sequoia 2022
description: Ready to match the hustle and bustle of your every day is our most sophisticated and most capable full-size SUV yet. Introducing the all-new redesigned 2023 Sequoia. It's striking in design and comfortable in character; get ready to move and be moved with every drive. And whether under the moonlit skyline or across a morning sunrise, its added comfort, upgraded technology and impressive capabilities will heighten your sense of luxury. Prepare to leave your mark this summer 2022.
